name: Dissonant Dream
description:
Where am I?

This place... it seems familiar, somehow?

I was doing something important, but i can't remember...

I hear something (...OUT...) It is calling me... Maybe that's my name

All I know is that I need to get out of here

I need to get the totems to escape, that is all I know

And then, maybe I can remember

     Run against time through 14 handcrafted levels and try to escape this weird dream, where reality shifts at anytime and seems to loop around itself.   
    You have a limited time to finish a dream before the dream shifts randomly to any of the 14 levels, including itself. You must collect 14 totems to escape, else you will be trapped forever. but the shifting nature of this dissonant dream prevents you from retaining any memory of your past progress, so you shall continue to run, hoping your only memory, that you MUST collect the totems, is enough to save you.

  • Control horizontal movement with A and D
  • Jump with the SPACE BAR

CREDITS:

Programing:

  • dino460 (myself)
  • 2dfssd

Level design:

  • dino460 (myself)

Game design:

  • dino460 (myself)
  • 2dfssd

(All programing, level design and game design done by me and 2dfssd during the GMTK Game Jam)

Menu and ending music by Frenchboy (Mysterious,, Futuristic 8 - bit Music Loop; on https://opengameart.org/content/mysterious-futuristic-8-bit-music-loop)

Levels background music by ShwiggityShwag (8 bit Title or Theme; on https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-title-or-theme)

Player Sounds by dklon (Platformer Jumping Sounds; on https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-jumping-sounds)

Game art by PixelHole (8x8 Dungeon Tilemap; on https://naggames.itch.io/8x8dungeontilemap)

Made with Unity
